title: Milan Fashion Week SS20: Best-dressed celebrities from Alexa Chung to ASAP Rocky
text:
Following on from New York and London, the time has come for the fashion pack to descend upon Italy’s cobbled streets for Milan Fashion Week.

With some of the industry’s most esteemed luxury brands on the schedule – Gucci, Prada and Fendi, to name a few – Milan is the favoured fashion week among celebrities, many of whom will either work with or be ambassadors for the labels on the lineup.

Dakota Johnson, for example, is a regular on the front row at Gucci while Versace always attracts an A-list crowd.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Thus far, we’ve seen plenty of famous faces grace the runway at the Prada show, which took place on Wednesday afternoon.

Alexa Chung sat alongside rapper A$AP Rocky and Vogue editor Anna Wintour while fashion influencers Susie Lau and Chiara Ferragni joined them in their best Prada-appropriate ensembles.

Even Big Little Lies star Nicole Kidman made an appearance at the show, wearing a long-sleeved gown complete with black, red and green illustrations.

Click through the gallery above to see the best-dressed celebrities at Milan Fashion Week so far.

With some of the industry’s most esteemed luxury brands on the schedule – Gucci, Prada and Fendi, to name a few – Milan is the favoured fashion week among celebrities, many of whom will either work with or be ambassadors for the labels
